https://tmrev.io/movie/15845-A Soap 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/voJjFkkn240R0ppNljTqxeuxRgO.jpg 32-year-old Charlotte could have it all, but she doesn't want any of it. When she moves away from her boyfriend, she happens to become the upstairs neighbour of a trans woman Veronica. Veronica prefers to keep to herself with her little dog and a romantic soap show on TV, while Charlotte gets through the nights with one-night stands. An assault, a new bed and some white curtains bring the two of them together. A Soap
